data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0iPY4uEnBZcQ7kNvgEBTKM6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYArGz_PBVhbdKJ_arrt8XS0zMnZC7ykCz4ODEObqqaDLA&oe=6666BF4C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BSDX2fp18mIQ7kNvgGkJf_v&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAmUsyJw18S7A1Z9h3lj8UjXr4ZB7tBb0xc0A8SLpJK7w&oe=6666F59F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wjinWb0qMGMQ7kNvgHC6UcJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA3tk3Isme7EUnvZucNOrLoy4dsiYm3fmQX3KylhBJuLg&oe=6666DAF1)
